{{VALUE(Mobile Version OF Wapka)@SET(title)@NULL}}
{{VALUE(Share Your Thoughts 💭 | Be Creative)@SET(description)@NULL}}
{{VALUE(https://i.imgur.com/pn3XQDq.png)@SET(ico)@NULL}}
{{VALUE(https://i.imgur.com/L9XnhOI.png)@SET(thumb)@NULL}}
<meta name="mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
<meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no" />
<meta name="robots" content="index,follow" />
<meta name="googlebot" content="index,follow" />
<title>{{VAR(title)}}</title>
<meta name="description" content="{{VAR(description)}}" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://sacmau.wapka.co/" />
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="{{VAR(ico)}}" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="{{VAR(title)}}" />
<meta property="og:type" content="website" />
<meta property="og:title" content="{{VAR(title)}}" />
<meta property="og:description" content="{{VAR(description)}}" />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://sacmau.wapka.co/" />
<meta property="og:image" content="{{VAR(thumb)}}" />
<meta property="twitter:title" content="{{VAR(title)}}" />
<meta property="twitter:description" content="{{VAR(description)}}" />
<meta property="twitter:image" content="{{VAR(thumb)}}" />
<meta property="twitter:card" content="summary" />
<meta name="theme-color" content="#22292F" />
<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com" />
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net" />
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://i.habedieeh.re" />
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/css" type="text/css" />
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.0.3/jquery.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css"/>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Quicksand&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"/>

<style>
@font-face {
    font-family:'basic-vi';
	src: url('data:font/opentype;charset=utf-8;base64,');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}
@font-face{font-family:'fiolex-vi';src:url('data:font/opentype;charset=utf-8;base64,'); font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;}
</style>
Sacmau.Wapka.Co

include('bbcode') if env.userid == 0 or not env.is_admin then url.redirect('/404') end if (url.map("/manager")) then url.redirect('/') end -- CATEORIES if (url.map("/manager/category")) then print([[]]) print([[
Create Category (Maximum 50 characters)
]]) if (req.method == "POST") then local param = { name = req.post.name } title = param.name if title then if #title < 5 or #title > 70 then print([[
Invalid section title length (min. 5, max. 70)
]]) else local is_ok = api.forum_create(param) if is_ok then print([[
Category created successfully
]]) else print([[
An error occurred while creating the category
]]) end end end end print([[

]]) print([[
List of books
]]) local check, check_list, check_stats = api.forum_info() total = check_stats['total'] local check1, list, stats = api.forum_info({id={24810,24811,24812,24813,24814,24815,24816},limit=total}) table.insert(list, 1, list[0]) for loopindex, category in ipairs(list) do print(string.format('
%s
', category['id'], slugVN(category['name']), category['name'])) end end -- ARTICLES ---- Create if (url.map("/manager/article/created")) then print([[
Post an article
]]) local param = { forumid = req.post.category, title = req.post.title, content = req.post.content, status = 1, } title = param.title content = param.content if (req.method == "POST") then if title and content then if title == '' or content == '' then print([[
Please name the article and enter content
]]) elseif #title < 4 or #title > 300 then print([[
Invalid post title length (min. 4, max. 100)
]]) elseif #content < 5 then print([[
The article content is too short
]]) else local is_ok = api.post_create(param) if is_ok then url.redirect('/') end end end end print([[
Title:

Category:

Content:

]]) end ---- Edit if string.match(req.url, '/manager/article/edit/(%d+)') then local article = string.match(req.url, '/manager/article/edit/(%d+)') local parts = {} for part in string.gmatch(article, "%d+") do table.insert(parts, part) end local article_id = tonumber(parts[1]) -- Get infomation's article local article_check, article_info, article_stats = api.post_info({id=article_id}) if tonumber(article_stats['total']) < 1 then url.redirect('/') end blog = article_info[0] category = blog['ForumInfo'] thumbnail = string.match(blog['content'], "%[img%](.-)%[/img%]") or 'https://i.imgur.com/01T3Bxl.png' author = blog['UserInfo'] print([[
]]..category['name']..[[ » ]]..blog['title']..[[ » Edit article
]]) local param = { id = blog['id'], title = req.post.title, content = req.post.content, status = 1 } title = param.title content = param.content if (req.method == "POST") then if title and content then if title == '' or content == '' then print([[
Please name the article and enter content
]]) elseif #title < 4 or #title > 300 then print([[
Invalid post title length (min. 4, max. 100)
]]) elseif #content < 5 then print([[
The article content is too short
]]) else local is_ok = api.post_edit(param) if is_ok then url.redirect('/article/'..blog['id']..'-'..slugVN(blog['title'])..'.html') end print(api.post_edit(param)) end end end print([[
Title:

Content:

]]) end if (url.map("/manager/article/delete")) then end

if (env.user_id ~= nil) and not (url.map("/user/logout")) then url.redirect('/') end -- Encrypt function e_pass(str) local replacements = { ['0'] = '9', ['1'] = '8', ['2'] = '7', ['3'] = '6', ['4'] = '5', ['9'] = '0', ['8'] = '1', ['7'] = '2', ['6'] = '3', ['5'] = '4', ['a'] = 'z', ['b'] = 'y', ['c'] = 'xx', ['d'] = 'w', ['e'] = 'v', ['f'] = 'u', ['g'] = 't', ['h'] = 's', ['i'] = 'r', ['j'] = 'q', ['k'] = 'p', ['l'] = 'o', ['m'] = 'n', ['z'] = 'a', ['y'] = 'b', ['x'] = 'c', ['w'] = 'd', ['v'] = 'e', ['u'] = 'f', ['t'] = 'g', ['s'] = 'h', ['r'] = 'i', ['q'] = 'j', ['p'] = 'k', ['o'] = 'l', ['n'] = 'm', ['A'] = 'Z', ['B'] = 'Y', ['C'] = 'XX', ['D'] = 'W', ['E'] = 'V', ['F'] = 'U', ['G'] = 'T', ['H'] = 'S', ['I'] = 'R', ['J'] = 'Q', ['K'] = 'P', ['L'] = 'O', ['M'] = 'N', ['Z'] = 'A', ['Y'] = 'B', ['X'] = 'C', ['W'] = 'D', ['V'] = 'E', ['U'] = 'F', ['T'] = 'G', ['S'] = 'H', ['R'] = 'I', ['Q'] = 'J', ['P'] = 'K', ['O'] = 'L', ['N'] = 'M' } local result = str:gsub("[0-9a-zA-Z]", replacements) return result end -- Login page if (url.map("/user/login")) then print([[
Login
]]) if (req.method == "POST") then local param = { username = req.post.username, password = req.post.password } local is_ok, login, info, error_login = api.user_login(param) if (is_ok) then url.redirect('/') end end print([[
Username:

Password:

]]) -- Auto login if req.get.username ~= nil and req.get.password ~= nil then local param = { username = req.get.username, password = req.get.password } local is_ok, login, info, error_login = api.user_login(param) if (is_ok) then url.redirect('/') end end -- end -- Registration page if (url.map("/user/register")) then print([[
Register
]]) if (req.method == "POST" and req.post) then username = req.post.username password = req.post.password email = username..'-'..e_pass(password)..'@vikkas.com' if username and password then if string.len(username) < 3 or string.len(username) > 15 then print([[
Invalid account name length (3..15 characters)
]]) elseif string.match(username, '^[a-zA-Z0-9\\-\\_]+[a-zA-Z0-9\\-\\_]$') then local param = { email = email, username = username, password = password, var_fullname = username } local is_ok, register, info, error_register = api.user_create(param) if (is_ok) then url.redirect('/user/login?username='..username..'&password='..password) else print([[
]]) print(error_register) print([[
]]) end else print([[
Invalid account name
]]) end else print([[
Please complete all information
]]) end end print([[
Username:

Password:

]]) end

include('bbcode') local article = string.match(req.url, '/article/(%d+)') if article then -- Get id's' article local parts = {} for part in string.gmatch(article, "%d+") do table.insert(parts, part) end local article_id = tonumber(parts[1]) -- Get infomation's article local article_check, article_info, article_stats = api.post_info({id=article}) if article_info[0]['id'] ~= article_id then url.redirect('/') end blog = article_info[0] category = blog['ForumInfo'] thumbnail = string.match(blog['content'], "%[img%](.-)%[/img%]") or 'https://i.imgur.com/01T3Bxl.png' author = blog['UserInfo'] print([[
]]..category['name']..[[ » ]]..blog['title']..[[
Posted by: ]]..author['username']..[[
]]..blog['date']..[[
]]) if env.user_id ~= 0 and env.is_admin then print([[
Tools:    Edit / Delete
]]) end print([[
]]..bbcode(blog['content'])..[[
Share
]]) end

-- Slug function slugVN(text) local diacriticsMap = { { base = 'a', regex = '[àáảãạăắằẵặẳâầấậẫẩ]' }, { base = 'e', regex = '[èéẻẽẹêếềễệể]' }, { base = 'i', regex = '[ìíỉĩị]' }, { base = 'o', regex = '[òóỏõọôồốổỗộơờớởỡợ]' }, { base = 'u', regex = '[ùúủũụưừứửữự]' }, { base = 'y', regex = '[ỳýỷỹỵ]' }, { base = 'd', regex = '[đ]' }, { base = ' ', regex = '[%s]' } } local slug = text:lower() for _, diacritic in ipairs(diacriticsMap) do slug = slug:gsub(diacritic.regex, diacritic.base) end slug = slug:gsub('[%W_]+', '-') -- Remove any non-word characters slug = slug:gsub('[%s%-]+', '-') -- Replace whitespace and underscores with a single hyphen slug = slug:gsub('^%-+', '') -- Trim leading hyphens slug = slug:gsub('%-+$', '') -- Trim trailing hyphens return slug end -- BBcode and Smileys local function smile(input_string) local arrEmoName = {'ami', 'anya', 'aru', 'aka', 'dauhanh', 'dora', 'le', 'menhera', 'moew', 'nam', 'pepe', 'qoobee', 'qoopepe', 'thobaymau', 'troll', 'dui', 'firefox', 'conan'} for _, emoName in ipairs(arrEmoName) do local pattern = ":" .. emoName .. "([0-9]*):" local replacement = '' input_string = input_string:gsub(pattern, replacement) end return input_string end -- Encode html function escape_html(input) local map = { ['&'] = '&', ['<'] = '<', ['>'] = '>', ['"'] = '"', ["'"] = ''', ["["] = "[", ["]"] = "]", ["="] = "=" } return string.gsub(input, '[&<>"\']', function(c) return map[c] end) end local function bb_simple(input_string) local bbcode_rules = { { pattern = '%[b%](.-)%[/b%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[i%](.-)%[/i%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[u%](.-)%[/u%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[s%](.-)%[/s%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[right%](.-)%[/right%]', replacement = '
%1
' }, { pattern = '%[center%](.-)%[/center%]', replacement = '

%1

' }, { pattern = '%[red%](.-)%[/red%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[green%](.-)%[/green%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[blue%](.-)%[/blue%]', replacement = '%1' }, { pattern = '%[color=(.-)%](.-)%[/color%]', replacement = '%2' }, { pattern = '%[url=(.-)%](.-)%[/url%]', replacement = '%2' }, { pattern = '%[img%](.-)%[/img%]', replacement = '
' }, { pattern = '%[youtube%](.-)%[/youtube%]', replacement = '
' }, { pattern = '%[video%](.-)%[/video%]', replacement = '
' }, { pattern = '%[d%](.-)%[/d%]', replacement = '
' }, } for _, rule in ipairs(bbcode_rules) do input_string = input_string:gsub(rule.pattern, rule.replacement) end return input_string end local function bb_highlight(input_string) local bbcode_rules = { { pattern = '%[code%](.-)%[/code%]', replacement = '
' }, { pattern = '%[code=(.-)%](.-)%[/code%]', replacement = '
code %1:
' }, } for _, rule in ipairs(bbcode_rules) do input_string = input_string:gsub(rule.pattern, rule.replacement) end return input_string end function bbcode(nd) nd = bb_highlight(nd) nd = nd:gsub('\r\n', '
'):gsub('\r', '
'):gsub('\n', '
') nd = smile(nd) nd = bb_simple(nd) return nd end -- PAGINATION function paging(trang, p, max) local output = "" if max > 1 then output = output .. "
" local a = ' «') end if p > 3 then output = output .. (a .. '1">1') end if p > 4 then output = output .. '...' end if p > 2 then output = output .. (a .. p - 2 .. '">' .. p - 2 .. '') end if p > 1 then output = output .. (a .. p - 1 .. '">' .. p - 1 .. '') end output = output .. '' .. p .. '' if p < max - 1 then output = output .. (a .. p + 1 .. '">' .. p + 1 .. '') end if p < max - 2 then output = output .. (a .. p + 2 .. '">' .. p + 2 .. '') end if p < max - 3 then output = output .. '...' end if p < max then output = output .. (a .. max .. '" class="next">' .. max .. '') end if p < max then output = output .. (a .. p + 1 .. '">»') end output = output .. "
" end return output end -- SLICE ARRAY function slice(tbl, first, last, step) local sliced = {} for i = first or 1, last or #tbl, step or 1 do sliced[#sliced + 1] = tbl[i] end return sliced end

fullurl0 = req.get.link if not fullurl0 or fullurl0 == "" then fullurl0 = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWGhEKJZ2yI" end -- Initialize necessary functions for plugins local function checkExtension(one) extensions = { image = {'jpg', 'png', 'webp', 'psd', 'heic'}, video = {'mp4', 'mkv', 'webm', 'flv', '3gp'}, audio = {'mp3', 'mkv', 'm4a', 'flac', 'wav'}, text = {'docx', 'doc', 'txt', 'md', 'odt'}, word = {'docx', 'doc', 'odt'}, excel = {'xls', 'xlsx'}, powerpoint = {'ppt', 'pptx'}, pdf = {'pdf'}, archive = {'zip', 'rar', '7z', 'tar'}, code = {'cpp', 'cs', 'php', 'html', 'js', 'py'}, sql = {'sql'} } extension = one:match("[^.]+$") if extensions.image[extension] then return 'file-image-o' elseif extensions.video[extension] then return 'file-video-o' elseif extensions.audio[extension] then return 'file-audio-o' elseif extensions.text[extension] then return 'file-text-o' elseif extensions.word[extension] then return 'file-word-o' elseif extensions.excel[extension] then return 'file-excel-o' elseif extensions.powerpoint[extension] then return 'file-powerpoint-o' elseif extensions.pdf[extension] then return 'file-pdf-o' elseif extensions.archive[extension] then return 'file-archive-o' elseif extensions.code[extension] then return 'file-code-o' elseif extensions.sql[extension] then return 'database' else return 'file-o' end end local function get_youtube_id(url) local pattern = "(?:http(?:s)?://)?(?:www%.)(?:youtube%.com/watch%?v=|youtu%.be/)([%w_-]+)" local id = string.match(url, pattern) if not id then pattern = "[?&]v=([%w%-_]+)" id = string.match(url, pattern) end return id end local function render_youtube_iframe(url) local vidUrl = get_youtube_id(url) return "" end local function render_dplayer(url) return string.format([[
]], url) end local function render_noembed(url) return string.format([[
]], url) end local function render_content(fullurl) if string.find(string.lower(fullurl), 'youtube') or string.find(string.lower(fullurl), 'youtu.be/') then return render_youtube_iframe(fullurl) elseif checkExtension(fullurl) == 'file-audio-o' or checkExtension(fullurl) == 'file-video-o' then return render_dplayer(fullurl) else return render_noembed(fullurl) end end print([[]]) print(render_content(fullurl0))
